Terrible experience! Ordered two Caesar salads with grilled chicken and cheese and they only sent me lettuce!!!!! Went back and they refused to add the chicken or cheese. Worst pizzeria by far.
I saw this place on uber eats last week they looked good so I ordered. I waited 10 minutes then got a notification that they are not open now. I will try again soon, looks like a nice place.
There are so many excellent options and the waitstaff is friendly, though they are busy so not super attentive. The flavors of the food, though...amazing!!! SO glad we found this place!
Delicious as always
Always good food and service. Ask for Dino.
Delicious food. The place is very clean and safe. The people that work here are very nice.The owners are very friendly. They make you feel very comfortable. That's why we like going there.
Great little pizzeria and red sauce joint. Tasty food, moderately priced, fast delivery, many choices on the menu. The garlic bread with mozzarella and chicken fingers are the best I've ever had.
Masks, clean, well stocked and friendly.🌻
Excellent veggie pizza!!! I got a 1/2 veggie - 1/2 Buffalo chicken... DELICIOUS!!!
Delicious Food and Excellent Delivery!!
My favourite pizza place in Bensonhurst with friendly staff!!!

I have been ordering from Torres for many years. I will say their food is great. However, recently, I placed an order and they totally screwed it up. They sent me another customer's food along with two of the side dishes I had ordered. When I called to tell them this they said they had my correct order in the shop, that they would send their delivery guy back to my home for the other customer's food and with my correct food. When the delivery guy showed up the second time at my house he was only there to pick up the other customer's food. He had not brought the correct order. I gave the delivery guy the incorrect food and he said he would be back with my correct order. I could not believe this was taking this long to correct a simple mistake. I called the shop to express my displeasure and as a long-time customer asked if they would throw in a couple drinks on the house for me. I was told that that was not their policy, even for a long time customer. I was told they had made a mistake and that they were correcting it. I asked why it took the delivery guy three times to come to my house in order to fix a simple mistake. For this I was given lame excuses. Needless to say I was very disappointed over my recent interaction with Torres and it will be a long time before I order from them again.
Great pizza and wings. This is always my to go to for a lazy night in.
Food is great over there and good serverce
Horrible phone service the person who takes the orders from the phone was very unprofessional I asked to speak with the owner he refused
Great pizza, always ask for Dino.
Its decent not great
Ummm good.
Very good service and prices! Food is very fresh and delicious and they have the best mozzarella sticks I EVER had!
Best sauce

Great pizza. Sicilian grandma was flavorful and crispy around the edges. With the rest of the crust was crispier and slightly thinner. Also got a vodka slice, and the cheese to vodka sauce ratio was off. Too much cheese, and not enough sauce but the crust was 10/10. Way better than the Sicilian crust. Still our go to place in Brooklyn as it’s right around the corner and convenient.
Great food
Too oily pizzas

Excellent food and great staff
good prices it’s surprisingly not way over priced like most spots and just good food in general
I made the mistake of going to another pizzeria for chicken cutlet parm. Never again. It was awful and a rip-off. I love you guys and will never ever stray again.
Favourite local pizza place. Been going there for years. Prices are bit high!
Have been ordering here for years. living in Bensonhurst.  We can order from a dozen aces. But this is Most consistent and top quality pizzeria in brooklyn. Great job guys!
Horrible food. Owner is extremely rude and disrespectful.
This is the last of the great ones in bensonhurst, I been in this neighborhood for over 25 years and thier food stands out!!!

After patronizing this establishment for over a year, I get treated like a criminal. I was accused of "canceling an order or orders" on Grubhub when I had no idea such a thing happened. As a restaurant owner, you should reach out to a customer regarding something like this, not accuse them of being deceptive. If anyone has ever used Grubhub, you know that they sometimes make executive decisions without your knowledge.  For example, I called to tell them my order had no arrived yet, and they will tell me they'll call me back and never do. But they'll cancel the order if they feel the restaurant hasn't delivered the food at the EDT without the customers' knowledge. I would NEVER do anything of that nature, especially when I  frequent this restaurant.  The person I spoke with (a guy) was extremely rude and disrespectful in his approach.  I had been ordering from this restaurant all day long(LITERALLY) using my card, and he tells me that evening that "he doesn't need my business, because I canceled orders from Grubhub and he has 'proof'. I hadn't even used Grubhub that day or the day before!! Childish.  There's plenty of wonderful restaurants in this area I will be pleased to give my business to. But it is the principle. You didn't reach out about this. We could've rectified that together. You guys lost a loyal customer. Highly advise against patronizing this place. Too overpriced anyway (but the food is good), and obviously poor customer service!!
Not what it used to be. Food is fine.
Refreshingly professional and courteous. My favorite pizza place in all of Brooklyn.
good food and fast delivery. one of the few places that also has angel hair pasta
Best pizza around
Very nice pizza, good fries; fast. Tidy, not cramped, comfortable inside.
Best pizza in Bensonhurst by far, their Mediterranean grilled chicken salad out of this world!
best veggies pizza 😋
One of the best old school Pizzeria restaurants left in Brooklyn. Everything is there is good and the price is always right. Recommend.

I just place and order to have a nice dinner and I asked for napkins and forks for my lasagna after delivery cuz never sent me, and they talk me I never asked for it, am So  disappointed at that point, the person who answer the phone so disgusting.

I have been going here for years and this is by far my favorite place to get a plain slice in all of Brooklyn. Their garlic knots are a MUST try!!!

Great food all around. I've ordered many things off the menu and it's all delicious.  Regular pizza to the speciality slices and the soups (yeah soups!), dishes almost all of it is amazing.  And I say almost bc I haven't tried any of the seafood items as I am not a fan of it.  My motto is "if it swims in the sea, it's not for me."  Lol.  Definitely try this place out for a quick bite or a great sit down meal.

Consistently great food. Good portions at a fair price. They are on my speed dial since we order from them at least twice a week. We order another twice a week from their other location as well. It's called Prince Pizza on Coney Island Ave and Avenue U. We've got everyone from Our Lady of Grace Rectory and Academy ordering from that location.

The best slice! I live nearby and there are no shortages of pizza places. This place has THE best veggie slice, loaded with every vegetable imaginable (spinach, broccoli, mushroom, red onion, tomato and maybe more). My husband loves their BBQ chicken. The crust is super thin and crispy. A must when in the area and worth coming for even if you're not in the area.
Great food and the employees are always very helpful
Great food, casual dining.
Always great quality found never disappointed.

Great pizza at a good price.

Everything I've had is delicious. Surprisingly I've only had the grandma and eggplant pizza. The soups are amazing. I know most people wouldn't think "soup" when at a pizzeria, but here you should! The garlic bread is delicious. The portobello salad is yummy too.

I use to live on top of the store so this use to be my go to spot to eat pizza. However, now I live 30 minutes away but I still buy my pizza from here whenever I need to order. The truest form of a traditional new york slice, thee guys live and breathe pizza. Amazing service and high quality food, my number one choice for pizza in all of NYC. Their Pizza is a must try if you haven't already.

Not clean food hair in the dish fake ingredients they say 6 pieces of anchovies inside the pasta dish even not one piece  they decieve you with black olive oil thinking that u don't know the difference of the anchovies & black olive oil....search about anchovies😃😁

These people are horrible, ordering from them is a nightmare becauss not only are they extremely rude they can't follow the simplest of instructions! Tried ordering from them through seamless on sep 3rd at 9pm... Not only did they call to tell me that their own menu inside the app is wrong and that I am "not entitled" to a potatoe, vegetable and pasta but also, when I mentioned that I already wrote in the instructions part of the order (that they don't read) that I don't want the stupid potatoe and vegetables and suggested they fix it... The idiot over the other line told me I HAD TO CALL SEAMLESS! I had to call and fix his business's listing. And then they cancelled my order... Never again. Oh and their food is really bad: salmon was poorly cooked and tiny and arrived cold and even tho I left the driver tips via the app he told me he doesn't get any of it and asked for more tips. Appalling.
Great pasta

Wonderful quality and service out of any pizzaria in bensonhurst!  Thanks Torres pizzaria, always making the right choice. 5 star quality food and wonderful service. God bless everyone that works there! All the way from 24th ave A2..!

The food here is amazing! Never disappointed Jimmy is always greeting us with a smile & kindness. He & the staff accommodating & Kind. Food is always amazing!  Always take my family & my mom here when I'm in Brooklyn. I highly recommend Torres!

Jimmy is an unaccommodating manager. I’ve ordered from them weekly. Rice ball specials one after another. I asked for a custom order because I was experiencing a lot of dental pain. After all my loyalty from my family and I, he continued to not be understanding. They simple shrimp parmigiana I asked for to be wrapped like a chicken roll was to hard for them to create. I’ll never give them my business again. My large social media following will also be made aware of the neglectful practices at this establishment. DO NOT SUPPORT THIS PIZZERIA! Loyalty get you no where at any business.

Clean and rather large classic NY-style pizzeria that serves slices and pies alike. In 15-20 minutes, you can expect your pies to be ready and perfect when you open the box at home. The Sicilian (square) and regular pies both hold together well and you won't find cheese all over the box or your plate. Love it.
